channel.title: Admin only items - Need help
channel.description:
Ok i want to so that if someone uses eg perfect ring and their PlayerRights = 0, that they either die and tele somewhere else or the item drops and they tele somewhere....
Let me explain If someone below the certain player rights uses an admin item it sends them a message "Sorry this is an Admin only item" Drops the admin item Teleports them away How do i do this?

item.title: Admin only items - Need help
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

Also is there a way of doing this

I have equipped a p ring
I try to equip a p knecklace
It sends a message " sorry you cant wear a p knecklace with a ring "
and it doesnt equip it

HOW DO I DO THAT?

Read full topic

item.title: Admin only items - Need help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In your wear method, where it says;

if ((playerItems[slot] - 1) == wearID) {

Underneath it, add this;

if (wearID == idHere) { if (playerRights <= 1) { deleteItem(idHere, getItemSlot(idHere), 1); sendMessage("You aren't a high enough rank to use this item!"); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Admin only items - Need help
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

Ok i want to so that if someone uses eg perfect ring and their PlayerRights = 0, that they either die and tele somewhere else or the item drops and they tele somewhere…

Let me explain
If someone below the certain player rights uses an admin item it sends them a message
“Sorry this is an Admin only item”
Drops the admin item
Teleports them away
How do i do this?
